@cityyouthfccm @CityYouthFC @NPMetcalfe @neville_steve @AndyLaw20011503 @VerulamProShop @SponsGrassRoots @snapsponsorship @_AnthonyGoose @Samchrisways @BKillner Delighted to be the  @CityYouthFC Community Partner for the next 2 years & beyond. Can’t wait to start working with you and helping young children of St Albans enjoy all the health & wellbeing benefits & camaraderie of sport. #stalbans #sport #homeoftheRyderCup

Delighted to have appointed our first Kickstart employee. Welcome to Ben Harden who has joined us on the scheme working in our Greenkeeping team, whilst undergoing a dedicated training programme. https://t.co/ruYPX6GkuM
Course coming on nicely, spring is here! #4moresleeps #HomeoftheRyderCup https://t.co/WoojlX0NLJ
Thanks to those members who volunteered today & tomorrow to ensure the work will be completed on time. #thatchremoval #stalbans #golf #verulam #homeoftherydercup https://t.co/lLAsTFhBcf

Great to have had dry weather so we could bring forward summer renovation work to give members an uninterrupted season. 
Graden down to 22mm, 12 greens completed today with the last 6 tomorrow. 
Follow up with over seeding & further dressing to get surfaces ready for golfs return https://t.co/jAAc5TpqAx

We are delighted to confirm our grant to join the Government funded Kickstart programme to get young local people into work has been approved.  #verulam #stalbans #jobs #youngworkers 

https://t.co/zhNFQa2zl9.

@EnglandGolf Have they got data on the number of golfers that have tested positive with Covid as a direct result of playing golf? 
What is their science behind not allowing golf in 2 balls?
@sean_mccloy Thanks Sean, hope you played well.

on their own, giving them a few hours to spend socially distanced on the course with friends is immeasurable.

Like everyone we hope normality approaches as every day goes by & we should never take each other for granted. 
Enjoy your Christmas the best we can & go again next year https://t.co/xZOhJTeYon

So Tier 4 it is & devastating for all of us & our friends in hospitality, retail & other associated businesses. 

We do not take it for granted that we are able to continue playing golf, albeit in 2 balls only. 
However the benefits that it brings to some of our members who live
A misty end to the week. Looking forward to a busy weekend on the course 🏌️‍♀️⛳️ https://t.co/kEzge6cmz8

Rest in peace legend. The voice of golf. 

https://t.co/PFmRKcfLyd.

It’s starting to look a lot like Christmas at Verulam!! 

Decorations up, trees are up & the music is on!
Lovely to welcome members back to the club today & look forward to everyone enjoying the run up to the big day! 
Thanks to John Wells for providing the tree again this year. https://t.co/UhCwfMLA3i
@bighamstuart No, Tier 2 is with those from same households or individual tables.
@bighamstuart Stuart, as emailed to members everyone is welcome in the club post golf and can have a beer, providing you order a ‘substantial meal’ as well under Tier 2 government guidelines.

All set for tomorrow’s reopening. 
Lots of work happened at Verulam during the month to further drive the club forward. 

Look forward to seeing members on the 1st tee & in the club after golf. 
Reminder that you’re limited to one hour in the clubhouse for a post game catch up.

UPDATE
Phew!!  Entrance resurfacing completed in time ready to welcome members back next week. 

#verulam #golf #stalbans #welcomeback https://t.co/PdBAE7wy49

We cannot describe how happy we are to welcome back members from Wednesday 2nd December. 

One problem.......we better hurry up & re-lay the entrance!! https://t.co/1GFLNAAqTi

Car park re-lined & entrance is to be resurfaced on Monday. New winter tee on the 8th to protect the main tee & it’s walk off areas in the wettest conditions. Lots more work scheduled for the next fortnight. Meanwhile, lovely hawthorns are out. https://t.co/vlUlJZetmL

Harsh that we are not open right now but lots of work taking place around the club. 

All greens & tees deep tined & dressed with 50 tonnes of sand applied. Surrounds micro cored & dressed. #winterwork #aeration #wishyouwerehere https://t.co/Kp3rvimbnx

Due to Government rules from today it is mandatory to wear a mask when entering the pro shop. 

Please note, you do not need a mask whilst in the clubhouse. 

It’s vital we all play our part. The quicker we help, the quicker we beat the virus #WearAMask #verulam #golfshop

@intelligentgolf Outstanding product, unbelievable new enhancements. You are all probably as tired as us! 👏👏👏👏⛳️

@jackpotjon @SteveCarrollNCG Agreed & hence why we have an outstanding accountant & team to ensure there is no hole. 
Which is why I think the article isn’t totally realistic & negative.
@SteveCarrollNCG @jackpotjon But then you seem to have ‘predicted’ a lot in your article?
@VerulamProShop We have some interesting swings in our membership but this is the next level! https://t.co/QmyxkHALU8

@skeajason @EnglandGolf @URVGC It’s actually very easy. Our reopening plan ensured members couldn’t arrive more than 20 mins before tee time. Only the group prior to the one on the tee allowed on putting green & one waiting. Everyone else not allowed in.  The planning & member adherence has worked perfectly.

RT @VerulamProShop: What a crazy, busy, fun day at the club. Great to be back open again (for members only temporarily). Here’s to another…
@Danversider Nothing normal about your swing! 🤣🤣⛳️🏌🏻‍♂️

Therefore we require all walkers to revert to the public footpaths now golf restarts. 

If any of you could see some of our members swings, you like us would have no idea where their ball is going!

For now we wish all residents stay safe & healthy. 
Verulam Golf Club

We have been glad to assist residents with their daily walks over the last few weeks & thank the majority for being so respectful of our course, we really have a great community in our city

Now golf has been permitted by Government we will be back playing from Wednesday 13th May https://t.co/ujUunidJrT

Good evening all, Lots of messages this evening but at the moment we are awaiting more information from England Golf, 🤞🏻 . As soon as we have any news we’ll of course let you know - https://t.co/NofVlf594U
https://t.co/IMy18uZidd
We are looking great in the sunshine. We are ready & waiting!  #verulam #stalbans #golf #sunshine #homeoftherydercup https://t.co/QiVG2790Pp

We are ready and waiting for our members & guests.

@PMileham @Robhealthcare I think many are Pete, & when we get through this I have plans to say thanks to them.

Tough time for all golf clubs, but the bigger picture is the problems the world faces. Now closed & cannot sell remaining food we need to rally round & stocks that will be wasted have to be donated to food banks. 
Will speaking with local food banks really soon
#allinthistogether

🔵Community Partner🟡 In late May we had the privilege of welcoming @VerulamGC to the @CityYouthFC family. @saintsandsacyic & @CityYouthFC School's delivery continues into summer at schools and colleges across

Early morning start in tier 4 today. But so glad that we can still do a long walk with a few sticks a ball and a bag.   Lovely morning at @VerulamGC. Well done to all the team there to keep it going at short notice with the rule changes. https://t.co/jXHRPLF20R
